price: Au izidishe - na soma Qur'ani kwa utaratibu na utungo.
arabic: أَوۡ زِدۡ عَلَيۡهِ وَرَتِّلِ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ تَرۡتِيلًا
footnotes: Au zidisha kwenye nusu mpaka ifikie thuluthi mbili. Na soma Qur'ani kwa pole pole ukibainisha harufi, na pa kusita usite, pasiwe na nuksani yoyote.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: aw zid ʿalayhi warattili al-qur'āna tartīlan
